mcdonalds.source: Calculated from McDonald's official component nutrition data
orderTips: Order bunless burgers through the McDonald's app under 'Customizations'
Ask for breakfast items 'no biscuit' – they'll serve in a container with a fork
Avoid ketchup (2g carbs per packet) if you're strict

burgerking.source: Verified from BK nutrition data via KetoConnect, CarbManager, MyNetDiary
orderTips: Order any burger 'no bun' – BK serves it in a container with a fork
Always say 'no ketchup' – it has sugar and adds carbs
For breakfast, say 'no croissant' on any Croissan'wich
The Bacon King is the biggest keto bang for your buck

wendys.source: Verified from Wendy's nutrition calculator via Hip2Keto, NoBunPlease, KetoConnect
orderTips: All burgers can be ordered no bun – they come in a clamshell with a fork
Skip ketchup on everything – it adds sugar carbs
Cheese is included by default even when ordering 'plain' – specify if you want it removed
Breakfast items: say 'no bun' or 'no biscuit' and they serve in a cup

fiveguys.source: Verified from Five Guys official nutrition via KetoConnect, Hip2Keto, CarbManager
orderTips: Say 'in a bowl' or 'bunless' – Five Guys officially supports this
All toppings are FREE – load up on cheese, bacon, lettuce, mayo, pickles, mushrooms
Extra cheese and bacon are free on the Bacon Cheeseburger specifically
Skip ketchup and relish (both have sugar) – mustard and mayo are 0 carbs
A 'Hamburger' at Five Guys is actually 2 patties – order a 'Little Hamburger' for 1 patty

components.note: Free toppings – add these to any burger at no charge or carb cost

chickfila.source: Verified from Chick-fil-A official nutrition guide via KetoConnect, Women's Health, NoBunPlease
orderTips: GRILLED nuggets are the star – only 1g carbs for 8 pieces. Avoid the breaded originals (11g carbs)
Any sandwich can be ordered 'no bun' – they serve it on lettuce
Best dipping sauces: Zesty Buffalo (1g carbs), Garden Herb Ranch (1g carbs)
Avoid Chick-fil-A Sauce (8g carbs) and Polynesian Sauce (high sugar)
For breakfast, order the Egg White Grill with no English muffin
On salads, skip the crispy bell peppers and corn – they add carbs

subway.source: Verified from Subway nutrition guide via Hip2Keto, KetoConnect, WebMD
orderTips: Order PROTEIN BOWLS – same fillings as a footlong sub but no bread at all
Any sub can also be made 'no bread' and served in a bowl with a fork
Double the meat for more protein and fat – only costs a little extra
Avoid Sweet Onion sauce and Honey Mustard – both are high sugar
Best dressings: Oil & Vinegar (0g carbs), Caesar (0g carbs), Ranch (1g carbs)
Add bacon, cheese, and guacamole to boost fat content

buffalowildwings.source: Verified from BWW official nutrition guide via KetoConnect, Sated, Left Coast Performance
orderTips: CRITICAL: Order TRADITIONAL (bone-in) wings – they are 0g carbs. Boneless wings are BREADED and have 50g+ carbs
Dry rubs add only 1-3g carbs total – great flavor with almost no carb impact
Best sauces: Mild (1g), Medium (1g), Hot (2g), Spicy Garlic (2g), Original Buffalo (3g)
AVOID: Asian Zing (21g carbs!), Honey BBQ, and any sweet sauces
Skip the carrots that come with wings (4g carbs) – ask for celery only (1g carbs)
Ranch and Blue Cheese dressings are both 2-3g carbs per serving

outback.source: Standard steakhouse nutrition – steaks are naturally 0g carbs. Verify sauces/sides at location
orderTips: Steakhouses are naturally keto-friendly – steaks and grilled proteins have 0g carbs
AVOID the Bloomin' Onion (huge carb bomb) and any breaded items
Get steaks with butter, not the house sauce (check if sauce has sugar)
Sub any potato side for a double portion of seasonal veggies
Caesar salad is safe – just say no croutons
Grilled shrimp and salmon are great lower-calorie keto options

chipotle.source: Verified from Chipotle official nutrition calculator via KetoConnect, Hip2Keto, CarbManager
orderTips: ORDER A BOWL – it's the same as a burrito but without the tortilla (40g carbs saved)
Say 'lettuce base' or 'extra lettuce' instead of rice – rice adds 40g carbs
NO BEANS – black beans add 20g carbs, pinto beans add 22g carbs
SKIP fajita veggies – they add 6g carbs. Go straight to protein + cheese + sour cream
Guacamole adds ~8g carbs but is high in healthy fat – your call based on strictness
Sour cream and cheese are both essentially 0-1g carbs – load up on both

innout.source: Estimated from In-N-Out official component nutrition. 'Protein Style' nutrition not officially published – calculated from individual ingredients
orderTips: Say 'PROTEIN STYLE' – this is an official menu option that wraps everything in lettuce instead of a bun
A 'Double-Double' is 2 patties + 2 cheese – say 'Protein Style' to make it keto
AVOID 'Animal Style' if strict – the special sauce and spread contain sugar (~3-4g carbs each)
Mustard-grilled patties are 0g carbs and add great flavor – say 'mustard grilled'
Tomato and onion add ~2g carbs combined – skip if you're under 20g/day strict
Plain fries have carbs – skip them entirely

components.note: In-N-Out patties and toppings for custom builds

tacobell.source: Verified from Taco Bell official nutrition guide via KetoConnect, Hip2Keto, TacoBeKeto
orderTips: ORDER A POWER BOWL – same fillings as a burrito but no tortilla (17g carbs saved)
Say 'no rice, no beans' on any Power Bowl – rice adds 19g carbs, beans add 10g
Seasoned beef has ~2-3g carbs from the spice blend – chicken and steak are lower
Sour cream and cheese are both 0-1g carbs – always add these
AVOID all tortillas (soft = 17g, crunchy shell = 7g each) if you're strict
Pico de Gallo and lettuce are both 0g carbs – great for adding volume

texasroadhouse.source: Standard steakhouse nutrition – steaks are naturally 0g carbs. Verified via Texas Roadhouse nutrition info and KetoConnect
orderTips: Steakhouses are naturally keto – all steaks and grilled proteins are 0g carbs
ALWAYS sub the baked potato for steamed veggies or house salad – potato is 40g+ carbs
Get steaks with butter, NOT the house seasoning butter (it has sugar) – ask for plain butter
AVOID the salad dressings – most have sugar. Ask for ranch or olive oil & vinegar
Caesar salad is safe – just say no croutons
The fresh-baked rolls are a keto trap – do not eat them

longhorn.source: Standard steakhouse nutrition – steaks are naturally 0g carbs. Verified via LongHorn nutrition info and KetoConnect
orderTips: Same steakhouse rules as any – steaks are 0g carbs, sides are where the carbs hide
ALWAYS sub baked potato for steamed veggies or a side salad – potato is 40g+ carbs
Get steaks with butter only – skip the Flo's sauce (contains sugar)
Caesar salad is the safest salad – say no croutons
The Outlaw Ribeye is their signature – massive portion, 0g carbs
Grilled salmon and shrimp are great lower-calorie keto options

panera.source: Verified from Panera official nutrition calculator via KetoConnect, Hip2Keto, NoBunPlease
orderTips: SALADS are your best bet – Panera is a bread shop, so avoid anything with bread
Say 'no croutons' on every salad – croutons add 10-15g carbs
AVOID all soups – even 'healthy' soups have 20-46g carbs (Broccoli Cheddar = 46g!)
Breakfast sandwiches can be ordered 'on a plate' or 'no bread' – same fillings, no carbs
Avoid all dressings except Ranch (2g) and Caesar (1g) – most others have sugar
The Rapid Pick-Up app makes it easy to customize orders before you arrive

wingstop.source: Verified from Wingstop official nutrition guide via KetoConnect, Hip2Keto, CarbManager
orderTips: Classic (bone-in) wings are 0g carbs – they are the keto staple here
Lemon Pepper is the top keto flavor – it's a dry seasoning with 0g carbs
Original Hot and Garlic Parmesan are both low-carb sauce options (1-2g per serving)
AVOID: BBQ, Honey Garlic, Sweet Chili, and any sweet-sounding sauces (5-15g carbs each)
SKIP the seasoned fries entirely – they are 40g+ carbs
Ranch dipping sauce is only 1g carbs per serving – the safe dip

dunkin.source: Verified from Dunkin' official nutrition guide via KetoConnect, Hip2Keto, NoBunPlease
orderTips: Breakfast sandwiches can all be ordered 'on a plate' or 'no bread' – same fillings minus the carbs
Black coffee and unsweetened iced coffee are 0g carbs – the only safe drink options
AVOID all flavored drinks, lattes, and anything with syrup – they are 40-80g carbs
Hash browns are 14g carbs each – skip them entirely
If you want cream in coffee, ask for heavy cream – it's 0g carbs vs regular cream
The app lets you customize orders – easiest way to say 'no bread' before you order
